summary: Café de Winter - sicilliana - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
title: Café de Winter - sicilliana - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki & Uraraka Ochako, Kirishima Eijirou & Uraraka Ochako, Bakugou Katsuki & Kirishima Eijirou
Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Uraraka Ochako, Kirishima Eijirou
Additional Tags: Ampersands indicate platonic ships, Alternate Universe - No Quirks (My Hero Academia), Alternate Universe - College/University, Bakugou Katsuki Swears A Lot, Bakugou works at a coffee shop, and hates every single minute of it, BNHA Fluff Week 2019, Fluff, platonic fluff
Series: Part 4 of BNHA Fluff Week 2019
Summary:

Uraraka, however, was looking over the menu with a wry smile. “So basically, you’ll be making all our food, right?”
Unfortunately, Bakugou caught on to what she was planning and glared at her. “Don’t you dare.”
She scoffed. “It’s okay! I’ll just order five drinks with literally every add-on you have, one of each sandwich, and … hey, if I eat all the cupcakes you have out, do you need to go make more?”
Flatly, he replied, “You are the fucking worst.”
Kirishima clapped Uraraka’s back. “Hey, she was just joking! She wouldn’t do that!” He paused and glanced sideways. “… you wouldn’t do that, right?”

summary: Since I'm finally up to date with the BnHA manga I started going more often in the tag, ('cause you know I won't get spoilers...
body:
Since I’m finally up to date with the BnHA manga I started going more often in the tag, (‘cause you know I won’t get spoilers any more) and I found out about all the traitor theories (yes, I know I am late). And all I’ve got to say it’s that I feel so BETRAYED.

HOW. DARE. THEM. attack my children like that??? What do you mean Ochaco is a traitor?? My boy Kiri would never!!!! Kaminari’s just a fool but he is our fool!!

You know I’d like to think that all of them are innocent but after reading this theories I can’t be 100% sure of that. Because they all make sense in one way or another. But out of all of them I think the Denki one makes the most of sense for me, I don’t know man, those sketches by Horikoshi are really creepy.

And it gives me such a weird feeling in the stomach when I see fanart with them. It’s like they personally betrayed me even thought nothing is proved and we don’t know anything. I WANT TO KNOW!!!

I am so invested in this story and this kids, it’s unbelieveble

summary: I’ll be doing 2 post per day on the commissions  I’ve been able to complete, one from Anime Conji and the other will be those...
caption:
I’ll be doing 2 post per day on the commissions  I’ve been able to complete, one from Anime Conji and the other will be those from before Anime Conji. This pieces here is from Anime Conji 2019 of Hawks from BNHA and no I am not that far in the manga but it was still fun to draw and color him! I had to bring this piece to work as it was….too large for my home scanner and it was still just 1/4″ too wide for the office scanner. So I had to flip the image to scan it twice then edit the wings and foot that had been clipped on. But the commissioner was very happy with this piece and it will be sent over to them this weekend. 


                Also….

THOSE WINGS MAN!! 
I DIDN’T DARE BACK DOWN AND LOVE 
HOW THEY TURNED OUT!! 
 I AM VERY PROUD WITH MYSELF!!



Ko-fi  - Instragram - DeviantArt

Commissions: Closed (Will open in Mid July!)

Art Trades: Closed (3 slots full! Sorry!)

Winsor and Newton BrushMarkers for….everything but the hair and skin! That I used Ohuhu markers.

summary: Start of something good - All_time_low3st - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
title: Start of something good - All_time_low3st - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto
Characters: Todoroki Shouto, Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Rei
Additional Tags: Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Adoption, Fluff, Established Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Anxious Todoroki Shouto, Pro Hero Midoriya Izuku, Pro Hero Todoroki Shouto, Soft Boys
Summary:

Summary: Another belated 1k follower post.
TDDK adopt a baby girl.
There are a lot of things Shouto Todoroki is prepared for. Villain attacks, crumbling buildings, an over-affectionate mother-in-law.
He was not prepared to be a father.
But it turns out, no one really is.
You learn.
-
Or, a smidge of angst and a lot of fluff.

Summary: Another belated 1k follower post.
TDDK adopt a baby girl.
There are a lot of things Shouto Todoroki is prepared for. Villain attacks, crumbling buildings, an over-affectionate mother-in-law.
He was not prepared to be a father.
But it turns out, no one really is.
You learn.
-
Or, a smidge of angst and a lot of fluff.

blog.name: atoraa
blog.description:
bakugou x reader

shinsou x reader

requests: open

body:
Requests Open / Rules

Hey, everyone, I’m a new BNHA imagines blog!


Bakugou x Reader

Shinsou x Reader


1. I’ll write fluff: kissing, dates, etc

2. I’ll write angst: death, cheating, breakups, etc

3. I’ll write any AU’s: soulmates, fantasy, etc

4. No domestic

5. No OC’s

6. No NSFW


Thanks so much ❤️

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Patchwork Hearts
description:
by PorcelainRose

At the age of four, Katsuki was cast aside by his parents and forced into the foster system because he was cursed with an unfortunate Quirk-Explosion-which happens to have negative connotations to it due to a villain in the past. His parents aren’t the only ones who rejected him because of it, though; he’s grown up without friends, with teachers and peers looking at him in fear no matter how hard they tried to hide it, and while he’d like to say he enjoyed being so lonely, that wasn’t the case. Fortunately (though he might say otherwise if you asked, at least at first), one set of bright red eyes somehow managed to see past his Quirk and his rather abrasive attitude and can relate to him on a level he never expected.

Years in the future, however, things aren’t all sunshine and rainbows-in fact, they’re far from it. Katsuki knows this, and no longer can he allow himself to drag the only person he’s ever truly cared about through the mud with him.

Words: 2896, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Kaminari Denki, Ashido Mina, Sero Hanta
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou
  • Additional Tags: kiribaku, canonverse, Canon Divergent, bakushima, Quirks, Orphan - Freeform, Foster Care, Abandonment, Other Additional Tags to Be Added

title: Introducing: Wolf’s Guild
body:
The Moon welcomes you to Wolf’s Guild, where we live for the pursuit! We actively pursue our goals whether as individuals or a group! Our guild motto is to keep one foot in front of the other and eventually you’ll get to where you want to be.

Let’s meet your new pack mates!

  • @lesbiemmy & mina1717
  • @perezosblog & @ringmasterxred​ @andersunny​
  • @sea241 & andersinner
  • @ebonyphd & @cherrymarts
  • @piades & @rubirose15
  • @validityhours & @bikunikida​ & @keuwibird
  • @ankala-works & Nenko-art
  • @diisaster-bi &  @mylittleyurii
  • @doctor-queenie & @meeks-writing
  • @asylumsession & @theuselesscucumber
  • kiarirose_kia & @bunnje
  • @majesticanna & @zennyo
  • @summerotaku & @ayakashikami
  • @hiantemo & @ayakashikami
  • @wrylyghoast & wekhter
  • @fantasticalfanfics & @hlebets
  • @kiroiimye & blueflamesdabi
